item.title: 508 commands interface
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

So im trying to make an interface where it shows you all of the commands for the server, meaning you type ::commands and an interface pops up. Here’s the code im working with;

if(cmd[0].equals("commands")) { p.getActionSender().setString(p, "", 156, 5); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "", 156, 6); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "", 156, 7); p.getActionSender().showInterface(p, 156);

Well, obviously there’s more then 3 lines of code, there’s actually around 90, and whenever i complete this interface with a list of over 90 commands there’s always around 90 errors. I’m not completely sure what im doing wrong, i hope someone can help me, if you need more information about the command im trying to add, i will add some.

Read full topic
